column3: ej,morgj101,M,mcclt901,Fan interference (Placement of runners) $Red Sox manager Morgan ejected by HP umpire McClelland for arguing placement of runners after fan interference; he said everyone should only get one base, not two
Danny Darwin left with tendonitus in right sholder
Luis Rivera hurt diving into 1B in third inning

ej,shelj001,P,meric901,Charging the mound $John Shelby charged the mound after being hit but was tackled by catcher John Marzano; both benches cleared and there was some pushing and shoving; Shelby was ejected by HP umpire Chuck Meriwhether and Clemens was warned but not ejected
$Albert Belle removed from game by Indians manager Mike Hargrove after Belle made an obscene gesture to crowd; 3B umpire Ken Kaiser went into dugout for apparent consultation
ej,lefej101,M,tscht901,Obstruction call $Mariners SS Jeff Schaefer charged with obstructing runner Tom Brunansky; Mariners manager Jim Lefebvre ejected by 2B umpire Tim Tschida
$Luis Mercedes called out for interfering with catcher John Marzano's throw; Mercedes was running in fair territory on the 1B line and Marzano's throw was wild over Mercedes
$Mike Greenwell stumbled going over 1B and suffered slight right groin pull and possible cartilage tear
ej,ripkc801,C,morrd901,Called third strike $Orioles coach Ripken ejected by HP umpire Morrison for arguing called third strike
